Class SuperMissile

  • java.lang.Object
    • DefaultCritter
      • Missile
        • SuperMissile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Critter

    public class SuperMissile
extends Missile
    This class extends Missile to add extra functionality for a type of missile that can be used as a super missile power up for the shooter, SuperMissiles are larger than NormalMissiles, and do much more damage.
    Author:
    Bradley Fourie, Daniel Banks, Heinrich Benz
    See Also:
    Missile, Shooter

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Missile

        angle

      • Fields inherited from class DefaultCritter

        radius, xCoord, xVelocity, yCoord, yVelocity

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SuperMissile(Shooter shooter)
      Creates a SuperMissile using the Missile class as a basis, uses the shooter it is shot from to determine its starting x and y coordinates, its starting velocity and its angle specified by the shooter at that instant, as well as its radius.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SuperMissile

        public SuperMissile(Shooter shooter)
        Creates a SuperMissile using the Missile class as a basis, uses the shooter it is shot from to determine its starting x and y coordinates, its starting velocity and its angle specified by the shooter at that instant, as well as its radius. Super missiles have a default velocity of 15, and a radius of 7.
        Parameters:
        shooter - the shooter that shoots the SuperMissile
        See Also:
        Missile

    • Method Detail

      • render

        public void render()
